title: How do I track single activity using my TalkBand B2?
answer:
Wake up the TalkBand B2 screen and swipe until you reach the activity screen ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=98350) . 

 Touch the start icon for 3 seconds and your TalkBand B2 will begin recording activity data. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=98351) : Pause 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=98352) : Resume 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=98353) : View the activity duration, data, and calories burned
